name: Tobacco (including vapes with or without tobacco, cigarettes, cigars, cloves
Cannabis (medicinal, recreational, with or without psychoactives)
Opioids (Oxycodone, Oxycotin, Demerol, Morphione, Dilaudid, Opium, Percodan)
Hallucinogens (LSD, PCP, STP, MDA, DAT, mescaline, peyote, mushrooms, ecstacy, nitrous oxide)
Inhalents (Glue, gasoline, aerosols, paint thinner, poopers, rush)
